entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
